title: Long live the lady! = Lunga vita alla signora!
creator_credit: Ermanno Olmi, Giampietro Bonamigo, Cinemaundici, RAIUNO and Artificial Eye
brief_description: Ermanno Olmi’s “Lunga Vita alla signora!” will be a delightful film for anyone working in the hospitality industry. Six young hospitality trainees are chosen to assist with a banquet in honour of a mysterious old lady. The great day does not unfold as they expected. Winner of the Silver Lion at the 1987 Venice Film Festival. In Italian with English subtitles.
